A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’ve never felt the need to review a movie but this was just a mess. You’re probably going to go anyways because it’s star wars but this is a movie I wish they didn’t make. It was exponentially worse than episode 7 and a major stain much like the prequels on the entire franchise. This movie sucked. The last 20 minutes were good\, but it’s a review based on the entire film... which was awful.
